name: exhibitor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who has made or owns something, especially a work of art, shown in an exhibition: Many of the exhibitors will be at the gallery to meet the public.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or company that shows their work or products at an exhibition: There is a list of exhibitors at the back of the programme.
